Sentencas: Apatite-type lanthanum silicate was successfully synthesized via a solid state reaction protocol at 1400 degrees C in a vacuum for 4 hours.
Titulo: Plasma-Sprayed Coating of an Apatite-Type Lanthanum Silicate Electrolyte for Intermediate Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells (IT-SOFCs)

Sentencas: The powder was synthesized faster and at a lower reaction temperature than by conventional solid state reaction methods.
Titulo: Plasma-Sprayed Coating of an Apatite-Type Lanthanum Silicate Electrolyte for Intermediate Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells (IT-SOFCs)

Sentencas: The resulting powder was used in the fabrication of a coating deposited by atmospheric plasma spray (APS) technology.
Titulo: Plasma-Sprayed Coating of an Apatite-Type Lanthanum Silicate Electrolyte for Intermediate Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells (IT-SOFCs)

Sentencas: The microstructure of the coating was analyzed by X-ray diffraction and scanning electron microscopy.
Titulo: Plasma-Sprayed Coating of an Apatite-Type Lanthanum Silicate Electrolyte for Intermediate Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells (IT-SOFCs)

Sentencas: Heat treatment was found to fully crystallize the coating, increasing its density.
Titulo: Plasma-Sprayed Coating of an Apatite-Type Lanthanum Silicate Electrolyte for Intermediate Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells (IT-SOFCs)

Sentencas: The ionic conductivity of the apatite coating was 0.39 (0.054) mS/cm at 850 (700) degrees C, and its activation energy was 0.67 eV.
Titulo: Plasma-Sprayed Coating of an Apatite-Type Lanthanum Silicate Electrolyte for Intermediate Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells (IT-SOFCs)
